solution_line_template: They earned {num_shoes_sold} x ${cost_per_shoe} = ${earnings_shoes} for the shoes they sold.
They earned {num_shirts_sold} x ${cost_per_shirt} = <<{num_shirts_sold}*{cost_per_shirt}={earnings_shirts}>>{earnings_shirts} for the shirts they sold.
So, they earned ${earnings_shoes} + ${earnings_shirts} = ${total_earnings} in total for the clothing they sold.
Therefore, Sab and Dane earned ${total_earnings} / {num_people} = ${earnings_per_person} each.
